goal: The main purpose of the site is to enable users to post articles related to science, education and IT, comment on and evaluate them.
opportunity: The site is running in demo mode, but now you can view existing articles, leave a comment and rate the article. For the convenience of searching, you can use a filter and sorting. On the Profile page, you can update the profile data.
